message: A rest parameter must be last in a parameter list.
suggestion: Move the rest parameter (...) to the end of the parameter list

example.base: function greet(firstName: string, ...names: string[], lastName: string) {
example.fixed: function greet(firstName: string, lastName: string, ...names: string[]) {
example.description: Rest parameters must be the last parameter in the function signature

example.base: const greetArrow = (firstName: string, ...names: string[], lastName: string) => {
example.fixed: const greetArrow = (firstName: string, lastName: string, ...names: string[]) => {
example.description: Arrow function rest parameters must be the last parameter
